question: 大事
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>big</kanji> <kanji>action</kanji> means something big is going down. This is no ordinary action. It is an action that is <vocabulary>important</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. Since <ja>大</ja> has two on'yomi readings, here's a mnemonic to help you remember which one to use:

Nothing in your life is as <vocabulary>important</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>valuable</vocabulary> to you as <reading>dye</reading>s (<ja>だい</ja>). You really just love dyes more than anything else. Dyes, dyes, dyes!
